name: Toucoin Miners
description:
Play as computer hardware (anthropomorphized as toucans) mining for a fictional cryptocurrency: Toucoin.

  • The objective of the game is to clear each level before the timer runs out.
  • Use your mined Toucoin credits to upgrade your mining hardware. You can improve your speed, damage, abilities, and more!
  • Beware not to overheat from rapid mining or from enemy heat beams.

How far can you make it in this blockchain-themed dungeon crawler?

Surrounded by enemies? The shockwave ability will get you out of a bind.

Buy upgrades between levels to keep up with the increasing mining difficulty.

Customize your hardware to match your preferred playstyle.
